description:
Combine project scaffolding with devcontainer setup in a single command. Initialize git repo, install dependencies, setup devcontainer, and open in VSCode automatically based on chosen template.

**Rationale:** Starting new projects requires multiple manual steps across different tools. A unified command streamlines the entire setup process from zero to development-ready environment.
title: One-command project initialization with devcontainer

descriptionHistory.description:
